You with dll / sound problems. 

go update your direct X before downloading single dll's: 
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&FamilyID=2da43d38-db71-4c1b-bc6a-9b6652cd92a3 

My sound works now.

If you have problems with .DLL's missing, go to the sanctum folder, in the install folder, and run the DIRECTX setup file.

You may already have the updated version but this install fixes the missing ones for this game.

Worked on two different computers for me.

@Andvariedfire I updated directx and I dont think anything is missing, but it just stops working when I try to launch it. Thanks for the help anyway.

@Daemonfang

Go to your Sanctum install folder. Go to Sanctum/Install/Direct X folder

Run the DirectX setup in there.

If that doesnt work, then go back to the DirectX folder. Open with winrar or winzip the Jun2010_D3DCompiler_43_x86.cab or if your 64bit then open Jun2010_D3DCompiler_43_x64.cab

Unzip the D3DCompiler_43.dll file to your C:windows/system32 folder and C:windows/sysWoW64 folder ( if you have one )

See if either of those work.

It's not the .dll made for that game in particular, so its missing code in it Sanctum needs to run.

Check the install directory and everything for some zip for that file in particular.

Maybe do a general directx update to the newest THEN run that one with sanctum afterward?

These sound like problems not related to sanctum. These errors shouldn't occur if you have the latest direct x drivers, windows updates, and graphics drivers installed. If you want help your gonna need to post your system specs such as CPU / Video Card etc...

So after installing, if you copy over the cracked .exe it should work fine?

HOST FIX

Here's what I did. In the cracked folder there should be two files. One is the cracked exe and the other is the steam dll. All I did was copy the cracked exe and NOT the steam dll. The game and hosting a game works and everything's perfect.
When I copied the steam dll over that's when hosting crashes. So just copy the exe and not the dll file from the crack folder and you should be good.

Many anti-virus programm flag keygen/cracks as virus. Most of them notice it's a keygen/crack and  give a false positive on purpose.

HELLO LAN/Tunggle working >>
WITH  all current 5 ! levels !

1. Install a non-steam version of the game.(reloaded is ok)
2. Install the update+fix on: 
(http://tunngrus.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=64&t=996 )
3. Install and launch Steam (you don't need smart or greenluma).
4. Launch the game via "\Sanctum\Binaries\Win32\ShippingPC-SanctumGame.exe".
